product_name: The North Face Ampere Pants - Men's
long_description: Versatile for your active lifestyle, The North Face Ampere Pants for men are designed to move with you and offer soft polyester fabric to keep you warm before or after a training run. Zippered leg opening makes it easy to put on pants over shoes, and an internal drawcord dials in the fit. Zippered rear pocket stores accessories. The North Face Ampere Pants for men have a 31 in. inseam. Part of The North Face Mountain Athletic line of technical clothing and footwear built to withstand the rigors of sport-specific training by outdoor athletes.
short_description: Versatile for your active lifestyle, The North Face Ampere Pants for men are designed to move with you and offer soft polyester fabric to keep you warm before or after a training run.
